title: Star-Crossed
description: ***A modern take on Romeo and Juliet***Release date TBA...From the day I was born, there have been things instilled in me.One. Respect the family.Two. Do anything for the family.Our way of life is that which benefits the family as a whole, so…Three. No decisions ever made with selfish intentions.I guess that’s how I got into this mess.I didn’t follow the rules.I smile to myself. He’s worth it.Fuck the family.
author: Belle Aurora
